headerTitulo.titulo: SATYA TRAD - LITERARY TRANSLATOR – SPECIALIZED IN COMICS

accueil.p1: You are a graphic novel author, and you want to send your project to French publishers? You need help to find the francophone publisher who would be perfect for your project ?
accueil.p2: You work in the book industry, and you are looking for a translator who knows perfectly the terminology of comics and publishing to translate your professional documents, website, or catalogues?
accueil.p3: Don't hesitate to contact me to exchange and talk about your projects!

quisuisje.p1: I was born in 1985 in France, I have an Indian name, my father is from Brittany and my mother from Quebec.
quisuisje.p2: As I grew up without television, I was naturally attracted to drawing and reading. That’s it, my work will be related to graphic novels, as it unites my two passions!
quisuisje.p3: During twelve years, I have been a bookseller specialized in comics in Paris and further in the south of France.
quisuisje.p4: I felt in love with Spain and Catalonia and move there in 2020 at Olesa de Montserrat, a small town around Barcelona. I become a graphic novel translator from Spanish, Catalan and English into French.
quisuisje.p5: I work for many francophones publishing houses and love to explore genders: children’s literature, historical, romance, fantasy, science-fiction, slice of life…
quisuisje.p6: In 2022, I take a new step in my life co-writing a graphic novel with the drawer Manolo Carot.
